metadata.name: Download File To Potentially Suspicious Directory Via Wget
metadata.comment: Detects the use of wget to download content to a suspicious directory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/wget')) AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\s-O\\s' AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--output-document')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/tmp/')))

output.summary: Detects the use of wget to download content to a suspicious directory
